stealth_challenges.name: AvoidDetection
stealth_challenges.description: Complete the quest without being detected

stealth_challenges.name: PerfectStealth
stealth_challenges.description: Reach the objective without alerting any guards

stealth_challenges.name: NoAlarms
stealth_challenges.description: Complete without triggering any alarms or traps

survival_challenges.name: NoDeaths
survival_challenges.description: Complete without any party members dying

collection_challenges.name: CollectAll
collection_challenges.description: Find all {count} hidden items in the area

mercy_challenges.name: SaveAllHostages
mercy_challenges.description: Rescue all {count} hostages, not just the required ones

combat_challenges.name: UseOnlyMagic
combat_challenges.description: Complete using only spells and magic

combat_challenges.name: SoloPerfection
combat_challenges.description: Complete the quest alone without companions

combat_challenges.name: NoItems
combat_challenges.description: Complete without using any consumable items

precision_challenges.name: PreserveEnvironment
precision_challenges.description: Complete without destroying any environmental objects

social_challenges.name: TalkToEveryone
social_challenges.description: Speak with all NPCs in the area for additional lore

notes.rarity_system: Weight determines objective appearance probability - higher weight = rarer challenges

weight_ranges.common: 25-35 (Basic challenges: no detection, no deaths, time limits)
weight_ranges.uncommon: 38-50 (Moderate challenges: perfect stealth, collect all, spare enemy)
weight_ranges.rare: 55-70 (Difficult challenges: optional boss, solo, no items)

notes.usage: Secondary objectives are optional quest goals that provide bonus rewards. Players can complete quests without achieving these, but doing so grants better rewards.
